attributes.action: Introduce a blanket age (i.e. Age 18+) for all ‘Adult’ practices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i.e. purchase and consumption of Alcohol (remains at 18) purchase and consumption of Cigarettes/Cigars (confirm and ratify the proposed 18), Sexual Intercourse (raise to 18 for all sexual persuasions), Marriage (raise to 18 regardless of parental consent and/or sexual persuasion), Compulsory Education (confirm and ratify the proposed 18), Voting Age/holding a Current Account etc. (remains at 18), purchase of Pornography - however this to now include Tabloid Papers/Magazines with a ‘Page 3’ or other Partial Nudity (raise to 18), Learning to Drive a car/motorcycle (raise to 18)

Basically make 18 the universal and acceptable age of ‘Adulthood’ as we currently confuse the issue by saying they can do this or that at this age or that age.
